amendment.description: An amendment adding at the end of the resolution the language that the previous question shall be considered as ordered on the motion to its adoption without intervening motion.
amendment.purpose: Amendment adds at the end of the resolution the language that the previous question shall be considered as ordered on the motion to its adoption without intervening motion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 220 - 212 (Roll no. 188).

action.text: On ordering the previous question on the amendment and the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 214 - 212 (Roll no. 187).
